name: There She Goes, Wriggle Nightbug!
description:
Controls:

  • Keyboard:
    Arrow keys: Navigate UI / Move
    Z: Accept / Jump
    X: Cancel / Kick
    Down+X : Dive
    Esc/P : pause
  • Controller:
    D-Pad / Left Stick : Navigate UI / Move
    A: Accept/Jump
    B: Cancel
    X: Kick
    Down+X: Dive
    Start: Pause/Skip

Credits:
@SlascoplerdSorasu (Game Designer, Art, Story, SFX)

@FerdysLab (Art, Programming)
@SlowBro (Music)

Touhou Project, and its characters belongs to ZUN
